MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power interruption in the LL20 postcode areas of Llangollen, Trevor and Garth affecting properties in Sunbank, Maesmawr Road, Llangollen Road, Blackwood Road and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30am due to urgent repairs required to equipment on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:23am on 9th April 2021.
